com.raouf.android.muff.Helpers

Class MovieHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raouf.android.muff.Helpers.MovieHelper

  • public class MovieHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    provides functions for a movie to fetch poster , rating and release. add/remove favorite. share to social media

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  MovieHelper.OnFetchListener
      listens to MovieHelper operations.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void favoriteClick()
      add movie to favorite if not added already.
      void fetchPoster()
      Fetch movie poster image then return result through MovieHelper.OnFetchListener

      Fetch movie rating and release date then return result through MovieHelper.OnFetchListener
